name: Oubliettes
description:
Oubliettes is a 2D action/adventure game. Made for the Great Harvest Game Jam. Set in an unknown time period, the player wanders into a forgotten and secretive but cozy bar. This bar is a hub for entry to great adventures, as missions can take you all over the realm. 

This game is a prototype for an idea. Currently, there is not much to show, other than the general art style and feel. The combat is still clunky, and there's a plethora of code to add! It is planned, and will not be abandoned. I pledge to keep this going.

The Idea: The player would be able to do procedurally generated missions from the Mission Board at the bar and receive rewards throughout/during missions and upon completion. I intend to add an inventory system and equipment system so that the player can witness firsthand the fruits of their labor. I will also overhaul the animation system for smoother transitions and multidirectional animation.

I have not been able to put in the time I wanted to into this over the period of the Game Jam due to a hard month, but I am eager to keep improving this baby.

Thank you for reading and making it this far!
